      • BROKEN_DATEFMT_PATTERN

        static final Pattern BROKEN_DATEFMT_PATTERN
        Not for public use, only readPackagePropertyDate(Calendar, String). Parses a weird format com.day.jcr.vault:content-package-maven-plugin produces but that cannot be parsed by ISO8601.parse(String), for example 2021-05-26T15:12:21.673+0200 instead of 2021-05-26T15:12:21.673+02:00 , see #format(Calendar, String).
